artist: Painter: After Pierre Puget; Engraver: George Cooke; Publisher: Vernor and Hood
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscriptions

in image in black: Puget | Below image in black: Painted by Puget Jun'r   Engraved by George Cooke / London; Published by Vernor, Hood & Sharpe, Poulty Dec'r 1, 1808 | on sheet in pencil: 2-246
life_date: After Pierre Puget, Painter, French, 1620–1694; George Cooke, Engraver, English, 1781–1834; Vernor and Hood, Publisher, British, 1795–1810
title: Portrait of Puget
